description: Deletes a fleet scaling policy. Once deleted, the policy is no longer in force and Amazon GameLift removes all record of it. To delete a scaling policy, specify both the scaling policy name and the fleet ID it is associated with. To temporarily suspend scaling policies, use StopFleetActions. This operation suspends all policies for the fleet.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A descriptive label that is associated with a fleet's scaling policy. Policy names do not need to be unique.

parameters.name: FleetId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the fleet to be deleted. You can use either the fleet ID or ARN value.
